lom:description.lom:string:
View the website for the College of Sciences and Technology at Savannah State University. "The College's programs are organized administratively into 4 departments (Engineering Technology, Natural Sciences & Mathematics, AROTC & NROTC). These departments offer strong vibrant Bachelor of Science degree programs in 8 major fields.
Our major programs are up-to-date and challenging. The College collaborates with Georgia Tech in offering the Georgia Tech Regional Engineering Program, Regents Engineering Transfer Program and Dual degree Program. The graduate program in Marine Sciences has started in Fall 2002. Our College is also an active partner in the Yamacraw Project."
Keywords: HBCU, African American Engineers, Black Engineers.

lom:title.lom:string: Savannah State University, College of Sciences and Technology
